channel.title: **server problem**
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been hosting my server for about 2 months and didn't really know of the things that could go wrong if you didn't know what you were doing.... I left my house to go to my friends house and carried my computer with me, i connected to his internet to resume hosting (no, it wasn't 24/7). well i could host there or back at my house, so i tried changing no-ip and all my ip related settings and everything. But it just wouldn't let me host. This error however, didn't come up until about a week ago. (the ip problem happened about 4 weeks ago). ANYWAYS.... i need help with this error!!
[IMG]http://i1080.photobucket.com/albums/j328/xxxpwned/Servererror.png[/img]

item.title: **server problem**
item.dc:creator: @IsolatioN IsolatioN
item.description:
@IsolatioN wrote:

Server is already in use. It means the port your trying to host on is being used. You may have another server using the same port going at the same time. Or if your using utorrent, close it first then re-start the server and open utorrent back up.

Read full topic

item.title: **server problem**
item.dc:creator: @xxxpwned xxxpwned
item.description:
@xxxpwned wrote:

Tutorial:

That means something is still running on the port your server was running on.

Well i dont have anything else running and it happens with all my servers… i even tried making new NO-IPs and everything. would changing my ip and updating my portforwarding ip help?

Read full topic

item.title: **server problem**
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

That means something is still running on the port your server was running on.

Read full topic
